short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mutes each new tab the instant it is opened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you getting tired of obnoxious ads blaring sound while you're browsing? AutoMute automatically mutes every tab opened in your browser, effectively allowing you to opt-in to hear audio in a web page, instead of forcing you to opt-out.
